titles.title: To amend the War Powers Resolution to require the President to include post-conflict strategy in the report required under the Resolution, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

bill.summary: 10/1/2003--Introduced. Amends the War Powers Resolution to require the President to include the post-conflict strategy (reconstruction, peace-keeping, peace enforcement, and nation-building) in the report required to be submitted to the Speaker of the House of Representatives and the President pro tempore of the Senate in any case in which U.S. armed forces are introduced into hostilities in the absence of a declaration of war.
